name: Escape Game
help:
Most of the time, typing something like <verb object> works. Example: <open door>.
You can go to a possible direction typing <go (direction)>.
You can examine the room or any object typing <examine (object)>. Look around with <look>.
More complex sentences are possible, example: <open box with crowbar>.
 Type <help verbs> to get a list of possible verbs.
error_movement_thing: You don't need to go to {0}, you are already in reach!
error_portable: {0} is too heavy, you can't pick that up!
error_generic_open_close: You can't just {0} without naming an object!
error_examine: What do you want to examine?
info_enter_savegame_name: Enter savegame name and hit enter:
info_you_see_nothing: You see nothing of interest here.
info_you_win:
You have won! Congratulations.
Moves: {0}, Points: {1}
info_press_key: press any key or tap enter button
